input.sentences: tonight we got everything ready for a party .
all our friends got together and had a few drinks .
every got chocolate cake for the party .
everyone at the party had a good time .
output.sentences: We are celebrating the anniversary of our company.
Jerry made his famous chili that everyone loves so much.
We are all close friends, almost like family.
Cali even baked a cake with a candle representing each employee.
As the evening went on, more family and friends arrive to help us celebrate.
